animeTitle: Naruto Soyokazeden Movie: Naruto to Mashin to Mitsu no Onegai Dattebayo!!
otherNames: Naruto: Gentle Breeze Chronicles the Film: Naruto, the Genie, and the Three Wishes Dattebayo!!, 劇場版NARUTO －ナルト－ そよ風伝 ナルトと魔神と3つのお願いだってばよ！！; Naruto: The Magic Genie and the Three Wishes
synopsis: Naruto discovers a genie's bottle while he and the gang are at a genin grill party. When everyone finds out about the genie's ability to grant wishes, the ultimate chase begins.
